name: Rouge Rush
description: Rouge Rush is a 2d platformer rougelite where you play as a mage who's goal is to kill every enemy before going on to the next level. Each level is randomly generated insuring a unique play experience each and every run. The player has the ability to gain upgrades as they progress on their adventure. The game features 45 levels, with a boss appearing every 15 levels. The game features a simple 8 bit inspired art with many unique enemies. There are three different worlds that include a grass, frozen, and lava theme.
